name: To The MooMoon
description:
Help MooMoo get to the moon in this rage-inducing platformer with unconventional movement.

Collect milks to increase your number of jumps.

This game is a simple mechanic prototype, and is therefore unpolished. It is also my first game being posted here, so let's hope I did nothing wrong.

Any feedback is welcome, and don't forget to cool off if it gets too frustrating!

Controls

Arrows to move

Esc to open the Menu

Mouse to interact with the menu's buttons
